snippet.title: DRONE PERSPECTIVE - Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Solo independent project about modern tactical warfare.
Preliminary release date: 5th of November 2024

Your wishlist on Steam will help a lot during launch:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2730700/DRONE_PERSPECTIVE/
